channel.title: Dinojah.Patkunarajah on UN-aligned

item.title: More Than a Mere Copycat? The Rise of AI-Generated Art and its Implications
item.author: Dinojah.Patkunarajah
item.description: Can AI art really be considered true art? The debate is heating up as many see this new technology as a mere copycat, while others argue that it has the potential to elevate human creativity to new heights.

item.title: 6 Solutions to Overhaul the United Nations Security Council
item.author: Dinojah.Patkunarajah
item.description: Six game-changing proposals to reform the UN Security Council and restore global peace

item.title: Where are Sri Lankaâ€™s Missing Children?
item.author: Dinojah.Patkunarajah
item.description: 13 years after the end of the Sri Lankan civil war, mothers of the disappeared are still searching for answers and justice.

item.title: Iran's Removal from the Commission on the Status of Women: Change in Membership Standards?
item.author: Dinojah.Patkunarajah
item.description: The UN has removed Iran from the Commission on the Status of Women for violations against women's rights, but many countries with poor records remain on the council.
